title: Computer keeps freezing when I play League.
body: in the past I had over 250 fps now it is always around 60 no matter what my visual settings are and if I have something running in the background my computer ends up freezing where as I play an mmo like guild wars and no problems. I haven't been able to find a solution to this. Can anyone help

replies.body: FPS issues like this could be due to oudated drivers, bad game files, or something else.  I suggest using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC and get this fixed.  Also, disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) if you recently updated Windows 10 as it's been known to cause freezing for some players.  Feel free to reach out if you have any questions!
